BLOCK.QRY: DELETE FROM ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST SET STR_ADV_CODE=?,STR_ADVANCE_NAME=?,STR_ADV_SHT_NAME=?,STR_DOC_REQ=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=?,GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,gnum_hospital_code=? WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_EARN_DEDUCT_PRINT_ORDER SET FSTR_HEAD_CODE=?,FSTR_HEAD_NAME=? WHERE FSTR_HEAD_NAME=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1

INSERT INTO ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP (NUM_ADV_ID, STR_DOC_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID,GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,STR_ADV_CODE,gnum_hospital_code ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
DELETE FROM ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP A WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? and gnum_hospital_code=?

UPDATE ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST T SET T.GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP (NUM_ADV_ID, STR_DOC_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,STR_ADV_CODE,gnum_hospital_code) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP (NUM_ADV_ID, STR_DOC_NAME, GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_ENTRY_DATE,STR_ADV_CODE,gnum_hospital_code) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 ,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACT_LAA_LA_ADV_MST_MAP SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE NUM_ADV_ID=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_EARN_DEDUCT_PRINT_ORDER T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE FSTR_HEAD_CODE=?
